data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @shaunviljoen 

The lookup lists we get from Deeds Office. Not our data and we certainly don't fiddle with it - we use as is.

We work on an API basis with Deeds Office - we will never be 100% the same, as they are the data source and are able to manipulate what they return to consumer.

The fact is - the property exist on both Deeds Offices because it WAS registered in the PTA deeds office initially. MPA Deeds Office holds the record now and all future updates would be there.

So if we(client) query the data for an old record they will return it, we can do nothing about it.
